name: Onigiri Bebop (Nokia 3310)
description:
NOTE: Sound is only working in Firefox.

Controls

Move: Arrow Keys

Actions: Space

After hearing about the upcoming 3310 Jam I loved the idea so much that I started early and ended up finishing early. The game is a kind of topdown adventure / platformer / rpg hybrid.

It was built from start to finish in a week over the new year holidays, which is over the limit for the jam but I'm still proud to have finished my first game project.

Hopefully this gives some ideas or inspiration for those participating in the jam! Enjoy!
